content.question: The speech given by Calhoun relates to which of the following?

choices.label: The effect of regional attitudes on federal policy making
The ways in which immigration changed American culture
The efforts by national leaders to expand the Pacific trade
The widespread support for the immediate end of slavery

content.answer: The effect of regional attitudes on federal policy making

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
